== Particles ==
{{info needed section|Testing in 17w46a and 17w47a reveals that the default position could still be seen using some entity rendered items. Things to test the validity and range for:
* Chest, trapped chest, ender chest
* Zombie head, creeper head, player head, dragon head, skeleton skull, wither skeleton skull
* Shield
* Conduit
* All shulker boxes
* All beds
* All banners
* Tridents
* Also see what's up with {{bug|MC-138797}}}}
; Block and item particles (breaking, broken, sprinting on, falling on, iron golem walking on, eating, ...)
''For version 13w02a to 13w17a, the default position coincides with the missing texture. Only cases where the missing texture is used due to it being in the default position (verifiable through use of a texture pack with a block texture larger than 64x64) are listed here; cases where the missing texture was used due to a texture actually being missing [[Java Edition missing texture and model uses#Missing texture|are listed here]].''
